## For New Jokes

- [ ] Jokes follow the required schema (id, category, type, tags, safe)
- [ ] All joke IDs are unique UUID v4
- [ ] Jokes are original or public domain
- [ ] No hate speech, discrimination, or plagiarized content
- [ ] The `safe` flag is set correctly
- [ ] Validation passes (`npm run validate`)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have read the [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the project's style and conventions
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
